Summary: a very bright orange and red fireball or flame like shape in the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn 09july11 at approximately from 10:20pm to 10:33pm chicago time i observed a very bright orange and red fireball or flame like object in the the clear night sky from my rear deck of my house. as it descended the fireball or flame object made j type turn and changed into a white color before a lost sight of it over the tree lines.this object was moving very slow, i would say slower then an airplane but much higher in altitude. i thought it was an airplane on fire but did not hear anything on the news. i was surprised by was occured but have the need to report it. i'm still trying to make sense out of the whole thing.
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around July 9th 2011
